body.p: I send you a Petition & affidavits to relieve. against the penalties of a bail Bond. I hope you will grant the prayer of the Petitions & enclose to me here or to Col. Wolford at Liberty
The psureties in the bond are F B Tucker Matthew Wethrington & A A Wolford
